com.mashery.util.string

Class StringUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mashery.util.string.StringUtils

  • public class StringUtils
extends Object
    This class is a utility class which provider string manipulation APIs.
    Restriction
    This class is not intended to be subclassed by clients.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static StringUtils getInstance()
      Returns a default instance which attempts to use the Apache string-utils provider
      static StringUtils getInstance(StringUtilsProvider provider)
      Creates an instance which uses the string-utils provider the invoker provides

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static StringUtils getInstance()
        Returns a default instance which attempts to use the Apache string-utils provider
        Returns:
        an instance of the StringUtils class

      • getInstance

        public static StringUtils getInstance(StringUtilsProvider provider)
        Creates an instance which uses the string-utils provider the invoker provides
        Parameters:
        provider - the provider implementation to which the string utils calls are delegated to
        Returns:
        the instance of the StringUtils which uses the provider to handle all calls
